    • Constructor Detail

        public Library()
        This class stores all the functionalities for the library system.

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        public void addBook(Book book)
        Adds a book to the books arrayList. Checks whether book being added is already in allBooks arrayList. If it isn't, it is added. This method is used for two things, 1. returning a borrowed book 2. Add a book to the library system.

        public void borrowBook(java.lang.String bookTitle,
                       java.lang.String personnummer)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Borrows a book to a customer. Sets return date of book (2 weeks from current date).

        java.lang.Exception
